Headline: #55N 55th/Narragansett Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Menard
ShortDescription: 55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, 63rd, Harlem, Archer & Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/Menard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Narragansett, 63rd, Harlem, Archer & Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/Menard.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink  Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green & Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier raised bridge at Chicago River, downtown. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green & Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier raised bridge at Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
